main event: U.S. Army soldiers reported observing a bright, fuzzy light that was circular and about 20 feet in diameter at White Sands, New Mexico, on November 7, 1957.
interesting points: The soldiers observed the light maneuvering erratically for approximately 5 hours,The light pulsated and changed colors from white to red,There were detailed discussions among the soldiers and their commanders regarding the sighting,It was classified as a POSSIBLE AIRCRAFT despite the unusual behavior,Similar sightings by other patrols in the area were reported, indicating a significant interest among military personnel.
sighted object: a bright, fuzzy light in the sky
witness description: The witnesses were U.S. Army soldiers on patrol.
